attributes.action: ask David Cameron why he always criticizes Mr Brown
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Any political news article I read, Mr Brown will say what he has to say, but moments later,David decides to criticize him, Can you please ask David why he always does this, why not for once support Mr Brown

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
